Handshake Dr. Catrenia just messaged you about an event Dr. Catrenia McLendon Academic Liaison/Project and Content Manager · 
IBM SkillsBuild Quick reminder — the live virtual session with IBM SkillsBuild and Muhammad Farooq is this week on November 19th. You’ll learn how to build and improve RAG systems using your own content — a great ... View message IBM SkillsBuild Virtual Event Building Smarter RAG Systems with Muhammad Farooq Wed, Nov 19 ⋅ 5 pm–6 pm EST Virtual View message Mute You received this email because Handshake partners with your school to help you grow your career. Manage email preferences or unsubscribe . P.O. Box 40770, San Francisco, CA 94140

metadata.subject: Don’t miss today’s RAG Systems session on 11/19
